content: विनियोगः {@--1@} Separation, parting, detachment. {@--2@} Leaving, giving up, abandoning. {@--3@} Employment, use, application, disposal; बभूव विनियोगज्ञः साधनीयेषु वस्तुषु <ls>R. 17. 67</ls>; प्राणायामे विनियागेः &c. {@--4@} Appointment to a duty, commission, charge; विनियोगप्रसादा हि किंकराः प्रभविष्णुषु <ls>Ku. 6. 62.</ls> {@--5@} An obstacle, impediment.
